Review_Text: Absolutely wonderful - silky and sexy and comfortable

Title: Love this dress!
Review_Text: It's sooo pretty. I happened to find it in a store, and I'm glad I did because I never would have ordered it online due to its petite size. I'm 5'8" and the length is just right for me. Would definitely be a true midi on someone petite.

Title: Some major design flaws
Review_Text: I had high hopes for this dress but found it outrageously small. I initially ordered petite small but couldn't zip it up. The petite medium was just okay. The top half fit nicely but the bottom was tight and had some cheap layers.

Title: My favorite buy!
Review_Text: I love this jumpsuit. It's fun, flirty, and fabulous! Every time I wear it, I get great compliments!

Title: Flattering shirt
Review_Text: This shirt is very flattering due to the adjustable front tie. It's perfect length for leggings and pairs well with cardigans. Love this shirt!!!

Title: Not for the very petite
Review_Text: I love Tracy Reese dresses, but this one is not for the very petite. I'm just under 5 feet tall and usually wear a 0P in this brand. The dress is pretty but overwhelming for my small frame. It needed alterations.

Title: Cagrcoal shimmer fun
Review_Text: I added this to my basket at the last minute and it matched everything I tried on perfectly. It's a little baggy but the color is gorgeous. Kept it because it went well with my jeans, pants, and skirts.

Title: Shimmer
Review_Text: surprisingly goes with lots
Rating: Ordered this in carbon for store pick up and used it to pair with various skirts and pants. Everything went with it. Color is a nice charcoal with shimmer. It's a bit big and loose but I kept it.

Title: Flattering
Review_Text: I love this dress. I usually get an XS but it runs a bit snug in the bust so I ordered up a size. Very flattering and feminine.

Title: Such a fun dress!
Review_Text: I'm 5'5" and 125 lbs. I ordered the S petite to ensure the length wasn't too long. Fits snug but not tight. Love that it can be dressed up or down.

Title: Dress looks like it's made of cheap material
Review_Text: Dress runs small especially around the zipper. Ordered SP which was tight. The material felt cheap and may rip easily. Disappointed as it was meant for Christmas.
This dress is perfection! So pretty and flattering.

Title: Perfect!!!
Review_Text: This dress is beautifully made, lined, and reminiscent of old retailer quality. It fits well and falls just above the knee. The reviews were spot on.

Title: Runs big
Review_Text: Bought the black XS to go under the Larkspur midi dress. The XS fit well around the chest but was flowy around the lower half. It could easily be nightwear too.

Title: Pretty party dress with some issues
Review_Text: Nice for holiday gatherings. Fits well, but the quality of fabrics is poor. The delicate netting on the top layer got stuck in the zipper.

Title: Nice
Review_Text: but not for my body
Rating: These pants didn't fit my body shape. They're for an hour-glass figure and too tight in the waist for me. They're well-made but didn't suit me.

Title: You need to be at least average height or taller
Review_Text: Material and color are nice but the leg opening is very large. At 5'1
Rating: the length was above my ankle and the fit was not flattering."

Title: Looks great with white pants
Review_Text: Took a chance on this blouse and it worked perfectly with white pants. Crisp and clean, fits great, and launders well.

Title: Super cute and cozy
Review_Text: A flattering, cozy coat. Works well for cold, dry days and looks good with both jeans and dressier outfits. Fits great.

Title: Stylish and comfortable
Review_Text: Love the look and feel of this tulle dress. Form fitting at the top and perfect length after steaming.

Title: Cute
Review_Text: crisp shirt
Rating: If this product was in petite, I would get it. The regular is a bit long but can be tailored. Fits nicely.
